overview:
Sven is a Principal at b-to-v Partners, having joined the business angel network in 2004. He is focusing on early and expansion-stage companies and is actively involved with b-to-v’s portfolio companies across internet services (including alaTest, eCift, iXiGO (acq by MakeMyTrip and SAIF), Plazes (acq by Nokia), WinLocal), eCommerce (Brille24, Urbanara) and retail (VOSS).

During his prior studies he worked in asset management at AXA Investment Managers and in consulting at A.T. Kearney. Previously, he gained entrepreneurial experiences in the IT/Telecom sector.

He has a Master of Business Administration from the Catholic University Eichst√§tt-Ingolstadt.
